result.title: IOI Training Contest #3 (CEOI contest)
result.content:
Hello again :D
this time i'm going to invite to participate in the third IOI Traning Contest
but this time it's tasks aren't from USACO , this time it's the CEOI 2008 Day1 problemset :D , the problems difficulty is similar to the IOI .
it will be held in Apr/23/2016 on 18 MSK . you will have 5 hours to solve 3 tasks .
the contest's URL : https://www.hackerrank.com/ioi-training-contest-3-ceoi-contest
i have posted the announcement from now to be sure that everybody will know about it .
good luck :D
UPD: 1 day left :D
you should download The Statements .
**Sorry but there is an terrorist attack by missiles on my region and half of my house is destroyed so i have to delay the contest until tomorrow **
